title: 4: The Christian Knight
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: The notion of the Christian knight is central to several texts, Sir Gawain and the Green Knight among them. There were several moral expectations placed on knighthood in the middle ages, including that of charity and fidelity.
itunes:author: A.J., Graeme, and Kathryn
itunes:subtitle: On the true knighthood of the middle ages
itunes:summary: The notion of the Christian knight is central to several texts, Sir Gawain and the Green Knight among them. There were several moral expectations placed on knighthood in the middle ages, including that of charity and fidelity.
itunes:title: 4: The Christian Knight
